stage1.overview: ISPL Grand Finale will be organized at Physical location based major participants location requests.
stage1.eligibility: Stage-3 shortlisted  teams are eligible to  participate in ISPL Stage-4 Grand Finale.
stage1.fee: Ilearnplace Student Member fee:   0 INR, NON ILP Student Member: 700  INR
stage1.judgementCriteria: Jury panel will evaluate  based on live STEM project performance  with  following points Number of Science & Mathematics  Concepts practically implemented Based on video presentation    Engineering Design    Use of STEM concepts in real life.
stage1.dates: Last Date of Video Submission:  5th September  2023
